comments:
Students were unanimous in praising Dr. Detlefsen’s immense knowledge of the subject matter and ability to keep discussions structured and on track. However, a small minority of evaluators wished the professor had let discussions flow more naturally. The evaluators felt that the course was logically ordered and well organized, and admired Dr. Detlefsen for her respect of all students’ points of view.
*Note: More than 75% of students submitted a written evaluation for this class
